message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $10,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. That's a bit high for my budget, would you consider $6,500?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your budget, $6,500 is quite a bit below its value. Could you do $9,000?
Hi Alice, I'm trying to be realistic with my budget.  Could we meet in the middle at $7,500?
